subskills.DESCRIPTION: Compare the weight of different objects using a simple balance scale
Demonstrate how different materials sink or float in water
Match objects to their appropriate containers based on size and shape
Identify objects as natural or human-made materials
Predict and test which materials are magnetic
Describe how materials feel different at different temperatures
Group materials based on whether they are transparent or opaque
Demonstrate how different materials absorb or repel water
Sort materials based on whether they can be stretched or squished
Compare how different materials reflect light
Identify which materials make sounds when struck or shaken
Match objects to their material type (wood, plastic, metal, fabric)
